Totally enrapturing, and leaves a lasting impression, best worldbuilding i've ever seen -- and it doesn't make you feel like garbage once it's ended! Good stuff.

Un Bioshock distinto a lo que estabamos acostumbrados, esta vez en el aire, una ciudad suspendida en el cielo. Tomamos el papel de un investigador que debe pagar una deuda entregando a una chica. Pero todo se tuerce en esta historia entre mas nos adentramos en la ciudad y sus personajes.
Lo malo que tengo para señalar es que no hay un guardado manual sino checkpoints
Its Rapture but in the clouds ...... minus the water ....... so it's not really Rapture ..... but it is Bioshock!

Além dos gráficos lindos com aquela cidade maravilhosa no céu, o jogo tem uma história muito bem construída, tanto que eu nunca ia imaginar "aquilo" no final, recomendo demais.
10/10
docela změna oproti předchozím dílům, ale vypadá to zatím dobře.

Since I'm not a frequent FPS player and am not a fan of the genre I was susprised by this one. It's not just a shooter, it's a narrative game as well and it just drowns you in a mesmerising world. The art is, in particular for 2013, stunning, a lot of detail was put in the lore of the game as well.
In the end this turned out to be one of those games that you just can't forget, it leaves a lasting impression on you and the complex story ends with a serious mindf!ck. Epic storytelling + fantastic gameplay + a unique world. What's not to love here? It's one of the best games ever made and I like it quite a bit more as the previous Bioshock games. 

9.5/10

Bioshock Infinite is the best entry into the Bioshock franchise. There is not much to say that has not been said already. The story, the gameplay, the twists and turns all wrap this up into a fantastic game that you want to keep playing. I found myself spending extra time exploring and looking around at the map for hidden objects and trinkets that the devs put around. 

This game surprised me for how great it was. The ending was fantastic. 

Overall 10/10

完美之作。视觉效果，游戏性，操作，都近乎完美。
非常有代入感，强烈推荐。神作。
Favorite Game. Ill suck devs dick no kizzap

This game has some excellent moments, which I will mention up front, before I criticize this game.

The entrance into Columbia, particularly the slow glide down and the walk through the flooded church as "Will the Circle Be Unbroken" is song beautifully by a choir, is AMAZING. I truly had chills during this section of the game that occurs about 15 minutes in. Also, when you discover a [spoiler]larger-than-life statue celebrating John Wilkes Booth, [/spoiler] this is a genuinely shocking piece of environmental storytelling which tells you everything you need to know about Columbia and Comstock. 

These moments are golden, however, the experience is overall overshadowed by weak writing and a lack of focus on game-play that is fun and engaging over the whole span of the game. About 6 hours in I was asking myself "when is this gonna be over. I want to finish this to understand the hype, but I'm not having fun."

There are many elements of this game that feel like partially complete ideas -- like Songbird, the reality tears, and the [spoiler] 'BioShock Multiverse ending'[/spoiler] -- these could all feel like really strong elements if they had been implemented in a way that is more interesting for game-play and narrative, but as it is they are all underdeveloped ideas, and the first two don't change game-play drastically enough to justify how unfocused the final products were.

What bothers me most is that the story is weak, and each individual area is not very interesting. The areas feel like stages for a shooting game, and while this is absolutely perfect for games like Halo, in a game like BioShock Infinite which tries to do so much narratively, the very gamey structure of the maps feels incongruous and counter to immersion. The level design could have been made to feel more realistic and therefor more immersive. I feel that games like Half Life and BioShock 1 do this well.

I didn't enjoy BioShock Infinite half as much as I hoped I would. I'm sure my opinion is somewhat skewed by the expectations that I had after playing the original which I love, but I also think my criticisms are valid on the whole. Buy if you're sure, maybe watch a play-through on YouTube if you're feeling tentative.

This is a brisk 8-12 hour experience that doesn't hold itself together as well as the other bioshock games do.  I enjoyed it, and I think most people will, but overall I think it was underwhelming when compared to the bioshock games before it.  On a sale, this is memorable, atmospheric experience for just about anyone.

BioShock serisinin son oyunu... Kesinlikle Türkçe yama ile birlikte oynanmalı. Ana oyunu 9-10 saat arasında bitirdim geri kalanı DLC. Öncelikle kesinlikle Burial at the Sea DLC'sini almanız gerekiyor, zira bütün konuları, BioShock'un ilk oyunları ile bunu bağlayan şey o DLC; ana oyun değil. Oyunun hikayesi bence güzel. Bu sefer öbür oyunların aksine distopik bir dünyada değil de, ütopik bir dünyadayız. Bulutların üstündeyiz, bir peygamber çıkmış; herkes ona inanıyor. Herkes huzurlu güzel günler geçiyor. Sonra biz borcumuzu ödemek için buraya geliyoruz, ve olaylar gelişiyor diyebilirm Spoiler vermeden. Öbür oyundaki Eve, Havva olmuş burada Tuz. Onu çok garipsedim. Hatta çeviri hatası olduğunu bile düşündüm lakin, Salt diyor karakter. Silah hissiyati mükemmel diyemem, ama yeterli. Bölüm tasarımı güzel. Oyunda teknik açıdan bir sorun yok. Grafikleri -herşeyi Ultra da oynadım ona göre yorumlayacam. 2013 yılında çıkan bir oyun olduğunu unutmazsak güzel, lakin günümüz için biraz cilalanması şart. Bu oyun ile ilgili tavsiyem, eğer ilk iki BioShock oyununu oynadıysanız, Bunun bütün DLC lerini oynayın kesinlikle. Yok eğer ilk iki oyunu oynamadıysanız eğer, DLC leri oynamasanızda birşey kaybetmezsiniz. Eğer ütopik bir dünyada herşeyin nasıl bir anda sarpa sardığı ile ilgili hikayeleri seviyorsanız, doğru yerdesiniz.

В данную игру обязательно нужно скачать русификатор, иначе игра становится унылая из-за не понимание о чем речь и вовсе сама игра.
Графика + оптимизация просто космическая, даже купив в 2021 году, я не пожалел не капельки. 
Играю на GTX 750 TI (2gb) на высоких в 900p и меня всё устраивает постоянные 60 кадров.
Сама игра очень интересная, её проходил ещё в далёком 2014-2015 году на пиратке, и за один вздох прошёл игру, качал вместе с русификатором, не как в Steam`е.
Так же лучше играть на колонках, почему? Потому что, ощутить весь кайф игры + русификатор, просто быть так же свободным как и наш Главный герой в игре!
Говорить можно очень много об этой игре. Играя в прошлые части, понял одно - эта игра самая лучшая!

没有伊丽莎白给我找弹药就没有我布克的今天，我这条命是伊丽莎白给的

老实说开头灯塔巨大的轰鸣声配合着天穹中出现的红光给了我巨大的震撼，仿佛世界末日一般。

随后从人间呈上火箭到天空之城的那一刻，惊讶到惊艳无缝切换。

维多利亚风格的建筑配合蒸汽朋克的魔幻特色，无意这款游戏做了很优秀的诠释。

剧情流畅内容充实，战斗体验新奇切不复杂，普通玩家也能轻松完成战斗。（游戏不就是消遣的么）

最后结局个人觉得不太完美 （9/10）

As a die hard fan of the first Bioshock, I have strong mixed feelings. 

This is a good game indeed, even if it is different steps below its parent.

Pros:
1) Good Plot, even if a little foggy at the end
2) Columbia is an interesting setting.
3)Good Level design

Cons:
1) I really disliked the two weapon limit: I played the game in "Hard" mode and much of the difficulty came from the shortage of ammos during combat.
2) The graphic is not so outstanding as claimed (I actually prefer the oleder two)
3) Too much light, I missed the grim tones of Rapture.
Es una autentica obra maestra, tanto de jugabilidad como de inmersion en la historia, de 10.
Сюжет, графика, геймплей всё здесь шикарно.

什么是第九艺术？这就是。

整个BioShock Franchise都是我会列入玩了绝对不亏的游戏，尤其是无限这一部。按惯例玩第一人称射击总该说点什么的，无论是游戏难度、地图设计还是武器平衡，又或是这个游戏精巧的闭环结构和完全收束的铺垫剧情，但我只想说说伊丽莎白。

（以下可能包含剧透）
伊丽莎白真是我在所有游戏里见到的最有陪伴感的NPC了。回想起这个游戏的时候我总是能想到无数伊丽莎白的画面，第一次在塔里见面的时候拿起书要砸我的伊丽莎白，问我选笼子还是飞鸟的伊丽莎白，在沙滩上起舞的伊丽莎白，剪短长发的伊丽莎白，战场上给我丢弹药和急救包的伊丽莎白。我本人也是女性，但我从伊丽莎白身上看不到男性凝视的游戏NPC设计，我只看到活生生的伊丽莎白。那时候我觉得我就是布克，伊丽莎白是我失而复得得而复失的女儿，是我愿意牺牲自己去拯救的人。
云端之上的哥伦比亚不是天堂，只是包装精美但败絮其中的扭曲乌托邦，金碧辉煌的疯子的仙境。但那里有伊丽莎白。就像生化2结局里所说的那句台词一样，you and I, we are the utopia.乌托邦就是你爱的家人所在的地方，乌托邦就是伊丽莎白。
多希望在葬于海底之前，伊丽莎白，我们至少可以梦到去巴黎。
Bioshock serisini bitirmek her oyuncunun farzıdır.
额，我是说，我的女儿不该以这种方式死去。
只要你喜欢伊丽莎白那我们就是好朋友
天空之城，蒸汽朋克，还有美丽活泼的伊丽莎白！

Here's my issue with Infinite, if it wasn't attached to the Bioshock name it would be a great game. However, as a follow up to the city of Rapture I'm disappointed. (I had to youtube the rest of the game because I just couldn't go on).

Story: Bioshock 1's story of a genius capitalist using his funds and other brilliant scientific minds to create an underwater city to escape government intervention felt sooo much more... je ne sais quoi organic you know? Now Infinite is just "racism and segregation bad". Andrew Ryan was a twisted, complicated man with ambition while Fontaine was ruthless and cunning. Where did all that artistic creativity go? 

Also [spoiler] you have to especially careful using time travel and alternate realities. It's not something I like to see in movies or video games because it can get so confusing and complicated, which it did in this game, because of that there are too many plot holes. [/spoiler]

Setting: As a setting, Columbia is a actually quite beautiful so I'll give it that. It doesn't feel as cramped or small as Rapture felt, with plenty of open space and plenty to explore. They've incorporated the era of time quite well too and the visual art design was on point.

Gameplay: This is where I was most disappointed. The system of Adam and Eve (which I loved) is gone, instead replaced by "Salts" and "Vigor" YAWWWWWNNNNN BORING!. You can literally only use like 2 or 3 attacks before you have to replenish your "Salts" (can't even say it with a straight face). You can only take 2 weapons with you which is absolutely pathetic. The sky hook thing is pretty boring after 5 seconds and the fact that they don't allow you to use it like spider-man is a let down. 

You can't take health packs with you or syringes to replenish your "Salts" . They removed the hacking system which I was extremely mad about, the upgrades didn't feel as reward as the first 2 bioshocks and the sky line thing really wasn't as amazing as critics thought it was 

Overall: Is it a good game? Yes very much so. Is it a good Bioshock game? In my honest opinion, no it isn't

Infinite is a masterpiece even among the rest of the Bioshock games. It's one in a lifetime experience, like Half-Life 2, The Witcher 3, Portal 2 etc, so do it, play it.

Hayatımda oynadığım en iyi shooterlardan birisi. Vigorların savaş alanını çeşitlendirmesi, oyunun müzikleri, düşman yapay zekasının  akıllılığı, mini-boss'ları ve Elizabeth.. O kadar çok etkenler var ki oyunun içerisine sürüklenmemeniz imkansız. Hikayesine gelirsek bir aralar insanlar forumlarda oyunun hikayesinin dünyadaki evrendeki en iyi hikaye olduğunu asla çözülemeyeceğini falan söylüyorlardı, üstü kapalı bir şekilde anlatayım oyunun hikayesi iyi ama fazla da abartmaya gerek yok bence. Oynanış çok çeşitli ve güzel, grafikleri hâla daha kendisini yadırgatmıyor. Müzikleri de çokça hoş. Size tavsiyem Season Pass ile birlikte alıp tüm oyunu bir kerede elden geçirmeniz. Aradan geçen bir süre sonra canınız geri istiyor oyunu zaten. Aslına bakarsanız parasını hak eden bir oyun fakat siz bence indirimleri bekleyin ve bu tecrübeden mahrum kalmayın.

Will the circle be unbroken?

SIMPLESMENTE UMA OBRA DE ARTE!

-O que falar de bioshock infinite? É simplesmente um dos melhores, se não o melhor jogo que já joguei na minha vida. O jogo tem uma história incrível, onde cada vez que você se aprofunda mais sua mente EXPLODE. A princípio(nas minhas 3 primeiras horas de jogo) não tinha gostado muito do game por aparentar não ter link algum com os dois primeiros jogos da franquia, mas após alguns acontecimentos no game não consegui parar de joga-lo! O jogo tem uma história indescritível e um plot twist final que me deixou em choque por dias, além de suas dlcs trazerem você de volta a icônica cidade de RAPTURE e dando respostas incríveis para alguns dos acontecimentos dos primeiros jogos. SE VOCÊ JOGOU E GOSTOU DOS OUTROS JOGOS DA SAGA, ENTÃO VOCÊ PRECISA JOGAR BIOSHOCK INFINITE! Te garanto que você não vai se arrepender!
-PS: Estou a caminho de platinar o game, me desejem sorte :P

No mais desejo a todos horas de diversão! E lembrem-se: Há sempre um farol, um homem e uma cidade.

NOTA: 10/10

终于从1代开始打通到了无限，从本体通关到dlc海葬两部曲通关后发现这是一个剧情跨越3代游戏的闭环故事时真的被震撼一整年。生化奇兵系列，真正的艺术品、神作。

10/10. Everything is executed perfectly in this game. Whoa! What a mind-blowing experience I've had, It's a complete change from its underwater, depressing predecessors Bioshock 1/2 games. The religious aesthetics, the voice acting and the intricate storyline are blended so deeply yet so meaningfully that not a scene is wasted or boring. Sometimes I just wander in the streets and feel completely absorbed in it like I was inside of a poem of W. S. Merwin mixed with a little bit Derek Walcott. Highly recommended.

BioShock Infinite ist eine Beleidigung für BioShock 1 + 2 und darf aus meiner Sicht diesen Namen nicht tragen.

Ich habe das komplette Spiel mit allen DLC's gekauft und schaffte gerade mal so mich durch das Hauptspiel durchzuquälen. Die DLC's werde ich garantiert nicht einmal starten. 

Ich kann dieses Spiel visuell nur den Hardcore Anime-Fans und "genshin impact's Sekte" empfehlen.
Alle andere, wer die Fortsetzung einer düsteren Atmosphäre aus den ersten beiden Teilen erwartet, werden hier enttäuscht sein und sollten diese bunte Cartoon-Anime Blamage definitiv meiden.

Spiel-technisch befindet sich das dritte Teil auf dem untersten Mittelklasse-Shooter-Niveau.
游戏在剧情上，音乐上都很不错，场景设计加上配乐，能让人陶醉在其中，剧情上也是写的一首好故事，没想到伊丽莎白其实是布克的女儿，平行宇宙的设定直到我在后期去了那个灯塔我才想明白，但也是因为前几部没有玩的关系，这一部有的地方还是没太弄明白，如果能够再有一次机会的话，我一定要再看伊丽莎白跳舞。
oi
후회 없음

12,25 TL'ye alıp 13 saat oynamışım. genel kurallarıma göre 0,94 TL/sa performansı ile önermemem gerekirken çok güzel oyun yaaa öneriyorum. ilk çıktığı zaman daha yeni çıktı nası goty olacak daha başka oyunlar gelir de demiştim :D gelmedi. 
diğer bioshock oyunlarını oynamadım bi kere başlamayı denemiştim ama nasip olmadı diyelim. yine de eski oyunlara çok bağımlı olmaması ve hikayesinin akıcılığı ile oldukça güzel bi oyun. bazı yerlerde tüylerim korkudan tiken tiken oldu bazı yerlerde de adını koyamadığım bir histen dolayı... güzel oyun işte ya. 2021'de bile keyifle oynanıyor onca yeni oyun varken.
牛

Одна из самых лучших игр, в которые я когда-либо играл на ПК. Отличная графика, сюжет также на высоте, сама игра затягивает уже с первых минут и держит вас до тех пор, пока вы эту игру не пройдёте. Так что, те кто не играл - советую, ведь эта игра уж очень интересная.

Truly a work of art! My all time favorite game i play is every 2 years or so and each time it is amazing.loved the first Bioshock but this is a completely different beast, the gameplay is essentially the same only smoother but the story is far more deep and impactful. the game art is absolutely beautiful.
